QuestData.Title: The Defense of Karabor
QuestData.Description: Defend Karabor from the Iron Horde.$B$BAt the end of the northern courtyard is Arnokk the Burner. He guards the entrance to the harbor behind Karabor, where the main Iron Horde army is waiting.$B$BOnce we've taken care of him, we'll need to deal with the Iron Horde leader, Commander Vorka.
QuestData.LogDescription: Destroy the Iron Horde in Karabor.
QuestData.RewardText: We did it, $n. Without your heroic efforts, the Temple of Karabor would have been lost to the Iron Horde.$B$BProphet Velen would be proud of us.
